name: ChargePointHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on ChargePoint Home.”
”Alexa, turn off ChargePoint Home.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Alexa can turn your ChargePoint Home EV charger on and off. Turning off Home will stop charging. 

Requires a ChargePoint Home charger connected to WiFi.
